title: Urinary Tract Infections in Children
description: Doctors at Hassenfeld Children's Hospital at NYU Langone diagnose, prevent, and treat urinary tract infections in children. Read more.
cleaned_text: Specialists at Hassenfeld Children's Hospital at NYU Langone are experienced in treating babies and children who have urinary tract infections (UTIs), which can cause pain or burning during urination. Although most UTIs are not serious, repeated infections can lead to more serious kidney problems. Our pediatricians and kidney specialists collaborate with radiologists and urologists to make an accurate diagnosis and identify the cause of your child's infection. Input from many specialists enables our team to identify the best treatment approach for your child.
